subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: LEXINGTON, Ky. (AP) — It was the class that seemed destined to end Kentucky’s championship drought — four high school stars plucked from different cities, who were considered a national recruiting coup for Coach Tubby Smith.
snippet: LEXINGTON, Ky. (AP) — It was the class that seemed destined to end Kentucky’s championship drought — four high school stars plucked from different cities, who were considered a national recruiting coup for Coach Tubby Smith.
